The project is written with reactive programming using Retrofit2 + RxJava3 on Retrofit2 + Coroutines
Implemented a fragment with the user`s page
Implemented a fragment with a list of all users. Added new features in the app settings.
The MVI architecture has been added to the project for working with and interacting with the server. Now all data from the server is downloaded gradually and processed in real time.
Implemented work with the list of user`s places of work.
To animate the loading of a list of posts or events in the UI, the Skeleton Layout library is used: displaying skeletons during initial loading and loading of the next page.
The Glide library is used to manage multimedia and download images from the server for display in the UI.
To implement the implementation of DI dependencies, the Dagger2-Hill library and the Singleton antipattern removal Factory are used.
The app settings have been updated. Added cache cleanup. A fragment with application updates has been added.
